SNAPCLIENT.D_CLIENT: Configure the local snapclient, you can either connect to the local server or another one in the network. Please note that the listed hosts are not necessarily snapservers, these are merely enumerated Volumio instances.
SNAPCLIENT.D_VOLUMIOHOST: Choose a Volumio host, note: you still need to verify and install the SnapServer on that host.
SNAPCLIENT.D_SOUNDCARD: The soundcard you wish to use for the SnapCast client output.
SNAPCLIENT.D_CUSTOMHOST: Define a custom SnapCast client host ID.
SNAPCLIENT.D_HOSTID: Define a SnapCast host by filling in its ID.
SNAPCLIENT.D_CLI:
This field allows you to add CLI commands to your setup.
You can find the commands here: https://github.com/badaix/snapcast#Configuration
SNAPCLIENT.DD_CLI: The CLI commands will be appended to the config. In the case of leading spaces, prefix the string with a backslash (\).
